00050

00157 
00158 void changePhase(TGraphErrors* gr, Double_t phase)
00159 {
00160    double x, y;
00161 
00162    phase = phase < 0 ? _TWO_PI + phase : phase;
00163 
00164    for (Int_t i=0; i<gr->GetN(); i++)
00165    {
00166       gr->GetPoint(i, x, y);
00167       x = fmod(x - phase, _TWO_PI);
00168       x = x < 0 ? _TWO_PI + x : x;
00169       gr->SetPoint(i, x, y);
00170    }
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 void removePoints(TGraphErrors* gr)
00175 {
00176    for (Int_t i=0; i<gr->GetN(); i++)
00177    {
00178       gr->RemovePoint(i);
00179       i--;
00180    }
00181 }
00182 
00183 
00184 double calcSpinFlipperPhase(uint markerAbsRev, uint markerRelRev, uint spinFlipperTune)
00185 {
00186    double phase  = _TWO_PI * spinFlipperTune/_SPIN_FLIPPER_PERIOD * ( (Double_t) markerAbsRev - markerRelRev);
00187    double spinFlipperPhase = fmod(phase, _TWO_PI);
00188    return spinFlipperPhase;
00189 }
